thread.title: Manheim Township vs. Cedar Crest: Friday Night Rivals preview

title: Manheim Township vs. Cedar Crest: Friday Night Rivals preview
text:
Manheim Township vs. Cedar Crest: Friday Night Rivals preview 
Updated: 
By: Shannel Douglas 
MANHEIM TOWNSHIP, Pa. -- Cedar Crest hasnâ€™t been able to beat Manheim Township in more than ten years. 
These Falcons want to be the first to break the streak and bring a winning tradition back to their school. They will have a tough time trying to stop the Manhiem Township offense. 
The Blue Streaks are on a four game winning streak and a huge part of their success is their quarterback, Erik Benjamin. He ranked one of the top passers in the Quad A with 16 touchdowns and only two interceptions. 
Benjamin has a lot of weapons to work with. The offense has been tough for most teams so far this season to stop. Related Stories
